abstract: NBA Roundup; Charlotte Hornets defeat Brooklyn Nets, 104-96; other basketball scores noted.
lead_paragraph: The Charlotte Hornets extended their winning streak to a season-high five games with a 104-96 victory over the Nets on Sunday at Barclays Center.

headline.print_headline: Nets Are Undone by Hornets; Davis’s 59 Propel the Pelicans

snippet: The Charlotte Hornets extended their winning streak to a season-high five games with a 104-96 victory over the Nets on Sunday at Barclays Center....
